main event: On 17 July 1952, a USAF pilot observed an unidentified flying object near San Antonio, Texas while flying at 12,000 feet.
interesting points: The object was about 3 feet in diameter and flew at an estimated speed of 400 MPH., This sighting was the third reported in the San Antonio area within the last 60 days., The object exhibited unusual aerial maneuvers and climbed nearly vertically before disappearing., No sound was heard during the sighting, and it was visible for approximately 3 seconds., Major Anthony Railo was a confirmed witness, and there were no meteorological conditions to account for the sighting.
witness description: a USAF pilot and Major Anthony Railo
